name: Scandinavian-Inspired Tiny Home Experience
descriptionShort: There’s no better spot to enjoy some much-needed rest and relaxation than from this stunning tiny home. As part of our Nordik health ritual, this home’s amenities will stimulate mental, emotional, physical, and spiritual rejuvenation. Dip your toes in the outdoor hot tub and cold plunge, warm up in the sauna, and enjoy your coffee or glass of wine on the stylish deck.
descriptionLong: There’s no better spot to enjoy some much-needed rest and relaxation than from this stunning tiny home. As part of our Nordik health ritual, this home’s amenities will stimulate mental, emotional, physical, and spiritual rejuvenation.

Dip your toes in the outdoor hot tub and cold plunge, warm up in the sauna, and enjoy your coffee or glass of wine on the stylish deck. Surrounded by the tranquillity of the forest, this property offers a remote, spa experience with plenty of privacy.
address: 567 Old Diamond Lake Rd, Harcourt, ON K0L, Canada
